title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 10 - Payment Of Interest On Mortgage Escrow Accounts And Insurance Draft Escrow Accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 10 - Payment Of Interest On Mortgage Escrow Accounts And Insurance Draft Escrow Accounts

State Regulations
§ 10.1 - Method of computing and crediting interest
§ 10.2 - Payment of interest upon sale of a mortgage; qualification for exemptions

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 10

Statutory authority: General Obligations Law, §§5-601, 5-602; Banking Law, §14-b

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
